articles.author: Poonam Singh
articles.title: Sachin Tendulkar In Pain, Says 'Won't Sit Silent' - OTV News
articles.description: The Master Blaster said he won't sit silently on the issue and his lawyer will be taking legal action against the casino for using the edited images.
articles.content:
Cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar revealed that he was pained to see his morphed images used by a casino to promote itself on social media.
The Master Blaster said he won't sit silently on the issue a… [+1258 chars]
